resources.string: Welcome Stranger to the world of DOTA
Sign in here using your login credentials

DOTA aka Defense of the Ancientsis a strategy video moba game. The Game itself originated from a mod from the game called Warcraft III which was created by Blizzard. The game is played between 2 different teams made up of 5 players on each team. You control 1 hero which you progress throughout the game by defeating computer played monsters or enemy heroes.
Your favorite hero in DOTA is windranger, a very agile archer
